that it is wrong to kill us. Thus, a discus-
sion of what it is about us that makes killing us not only wrong, but seriously
wrong, seems to be the right place to begin a discussion of the abortion issue.
Who is primarily wronged by a killing? The wrong of killing is not primar-
ily  explained  in  terms  of  the  loss  to  the  family  and  friends  of  the  victim.
Perhaps the victim is a hermit. Perhaps one’s friends find it easy to make
